sentences.en: ...a casket draped in the Virginia flag.
sentences.cn: …一口覆盖着弗吉尼亚州旗的棺材。

sentences.en: Appearance performances include drape pendency, stiffness and crease recovering, etc.
sentences.cn: 服装的外观性能包括悬垂性 、 硬挺度、折痕恢复性 、 起毛起球等方面.

sentences.en: Don't drape your feet over the chair.
sentences.cn: 坐得端正些,不要把腿悬空架在椅子边上.

sentences.en: He pulled the drapes shut, locked the door behind him.
sentences.cn: 他拉上长帘,锁上了身后的门。

sentences.en: Humboldt wanted to drape the world in radiance.
sentences.cn: 洪堡想把世界装饰得光彩夺目.

sentences.en: I'll drape this coat around your shoulders to keep you warm.
sentences.cn: 我要把这件大衣披在你肩上以防着凉.

sentences.en: I'm going to cover you with a drape, across your thighs.
sentences.cn: 我要用布帘盖在你的臀部上.

sentences.en: Igneous drape reservoir is a special type of reservoir.
sentences.cn: 火成岩披覆油藏是一种特殊的油藏类型.

sentences.en: Let us drape this picture of our leader in the national flag.
sentences.cn: 用国旗装饰这幅领袖画像吧!

sentences.en: The fabric is with bulky hand and good drape.
sentences.cn: 其织物手感丰满,悬垂性能好.

sentences.en: The new drape tester , ZYF - 1 fabric - drape testerwith a computer , isdescribed.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍应用现代计算机技术和新的测试手段研制的 ZYF ──1型织物悬垂仪.

sentences.en: The new plastic incise drape could reduce incision and inner incision contamination.
sentences.cn: 新型切口保护膜能有效减少切口及切口内的污染.

sentences.en: The prototype basin has undergone mosaic, cross, drape and mosaic four superimposed processes.
sentences.cn: 其原型盆地经历了镶嵌 、 交错 、 披盖、再镶嵌等四个叠置过程.

sentences.en: The results showed that PTT fabrics had soft handle , drape and anti - crease.
sentences.cn: 通过测试分析可以得出:利用PTT纤维 可得到柔软 、 悬垂、 抗 皱的弹性机织物.

sentences.en: Unless assistants are well trained, the surgeon should drape the patient.
sentences.cn: 除非助手经过良好的训练, 否则手术医生应亲自给病人铺单.

sentences.en: We have drape for living room, but we need kitchen curtain.
sentences.cn: 我们为客厅准备了窗帘, 但是我们还需要厨房的窗帘.

sentences.en: You just drape your skirt over it and nobody suspects a thing.
sentences.cn: 你只需要用裙子把它遮住,没人会发现的.

trans.tran_cn: （厚长的）帘子，帷帘，帷幕，（帘、幕、衣、裙等）悬挂状
用布帘覆盖；使呈褶裥状
trans.tran_en: If someone or something is draped in a piece of cloth, they are loosely covered by it

trans.tran_cn: 将（衣物、帘、斗篷等）悬挂，披，（用布等）遮盖或装饰某人或某物，将某物随便围在或放在另一物上，[医]在（手术室等处）挂上消毒帷
